document_data.mainbody:
the cursed Imaskari flaskNote that this flask is never referred to using this name in the book it is merely described. was an Imaskari relic unearthed from the ruins of Solon by the slaves of Ambuchar Devayam.
This was a copper flask.
The flask could provide up to 10 gallons of water per day. The water out of the flask would be green and foul-smelling.
